sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒ de shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est mon livre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is my book.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng dǎkāi kèběn dì wǔ yè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez ouvrir le manuel à la page cinq.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please open the textbook to page five.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan kàn shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime lire des livres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to read books.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 上次我们见面是在北京。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shàngcì wǒmen jiànmiàn shì zài Běijīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La dernière fois que nous nous sommes vus, c'était à Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Last time we met was in Beijing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Háizimen xiàwǔ sān diǎn fàngxué.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants finissent l'école à trois heures de l'après-midi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The children finish school at three in the afternoon.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Méishìr, búyòng dānxīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce n'est rien, ne t'inquiète pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's nothing, don't worry.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ tīngdào le yī gè hǎo xiāoxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai entendu une bonne nouvelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I heard good news.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen jiā yǒu sān jiān fángjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre maison a trois pièces.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our home has three rooms.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiǎojie, qǐngwèn zhège duōshao qián?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mademoiselle, combien coûte ceci ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Miss, how much is this?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Búyào bǎ shū fàng zài dìshàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne mets pas le livre par terre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't put the book on the floor.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 新年快乐！祝你身体健康！
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīnnián kuàilè! Zhù nǐ shēntǐ jiànkāng!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bonne année ! Je te souhaite bonne santé !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Happy New Year! I wish you good health!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yī nián yǒu sì gè jìjié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Une année a quatre saisons.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A year has four seasons.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gāoxìng de xiào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a ri joyeusement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He laughed happily.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào mǎi yī gè xīn běnzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin d'acheter un nouveau cahier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to buy a new notebook.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我每天学习五个新汉字。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān xuéxí wǔ gè xīn hànzì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'apprends cinq nouveaux caractères chinois chaque jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I learn five new Chinese characters every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shì yī míng dàxuéshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis étudiant universitaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am a university student.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài shāng xuéyuàn xuéxí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il étudie à l'école de commerce.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He studies at the business school.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们坐出租车去机场吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zuò chūzūchē qù jīchǎng ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Prenons un taxi pour aller à l'aéroport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's take a taxi to the airport.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīshēng zhèngzài kàn bìngrén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin est en train d'examiner un patient.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor is seeing a patient.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 不用谢，这是我应该做的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Búyòng xiè, zhè shì wǒ yīnggāi zuò de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pas de quoi, c'est ce que je devais faire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: No need to thank me, it's what I should do.
